item.title: Kubelet architecture
item.description: In the past I learnt a lot of kubernetes, however there is no much information about kubelet or not deep enough. I couldnâ€™t answer the questions about kubelet correctly in an interview. Here I put all the information I collected from the internet here for my references. kubelet component architecture how does kubelet work Container Lifecycle Management Through the CRI kubelet, CRI and CNI sequence diagram kubelet, CRI and CNI interaction diagram The process of creating a pod Handler The work of podWorkers syncPod kubelet Runtime Creating a sandbox for a pod References: https://www.
